poster: Ξ F i L i P Ξ
title: PLEASE Help me !!!
body:
**My LoL folder is in /Computer>Local Disk (C:)>Porgram Files>Riot Games>League of legends**
When i click choice folder, and select path to the lol folder(like i type Up) its says INVALID lol folder.



https://imgur.com/EiXp04G

replies.body: My similar folder has a "lol.launcher.exe" in it, which I believe is the actual game executable that might be what this program is looking for. Look for that file on your machine.

What _exactly_ is it asking for, and what _exactly_ appears in the entry field after you select the folder? It's probably checking the location you specified for a specific file (like LoL's main .exe or something) so that it can assume the presence of a particular directory structure there.

replies.poster: Ξ F i L i P Ξ
replies.body:

Program need to select direct League.exe folder
When i select direct folder(i think this is direct folder because i dont have any other) its says Invalid folder. **I dont know which folder i need to select is it this folder     https://imgur.com/ltuFsuv                 
               https://imgur.com/PaqXgQb  Or some other??**

replies.body:
Is that maybe because i have only LeagueClient folder?
And if that is because i dont have League Of Legends folder how do i make league of legends folder?
Did you literally enter "/Computer>Local Disk (C:)>Porgram Files>Riot Games>League of legends"? That's not right.
